headline: Boeing Investment in Espace Aéro to Strengthen Quebec's Aerospace Competitiveness
summary: Today, Aéro Montréal, Quebec's aerospace cluster, signed a Memorandum of Agreement (MOA) with Boeing confirming a CAD $110 million (USD $85 million) investment in Espace Aéro, Quebec's new aerospace innovation zone and in Aéro Montréal's MACH initiative (Parcours Aéro Compétitivité). This investment will directly support the development of Quebec's aerospace innovation zone and strengthen the province's aerospace sector, particularly in the strategic areas of sustainable transformation and auton

headline: The Bull Case For Allegiant Travel (ALGT) Could Change Following New Routes and Shifting Analyst Sentiment
summary: In recent days, Allegiant Travel Company announced the addition of three new nonstop routes connecting five cities and continued its fleet modernization efforts to keep pace with growing air travel demand. The company also faces ongoing challenges, including production delays at Boeing and high labor costs that could impact future operations. Amid these developments, several analysts raised their outlook on Allegiant Travel, reflecting increased optimism about the company's ability to...

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Tesla, Applied Materials, Boeing, Rumble, and More
summary: Stock futures were rising Friday, pointing to fresh record highs, as investors continued to shrug off the government shutdown.  Tesla  was rising 1.2% in premarket trading after falling 5.1% on Thursday even as the electric-vehicle maker reported third-quarter deliveries of 497,099 cars, a record for any quarter.  The stock drop Thursday ended a four-session winning streak.

The stock drop Thursday ended a four-session winning streak.

headline: Boeing delays 777X debut to 2027, faces up to $4 billion charge - report
summary: Investing.com -- Boeing’s 777X is now expected to enter commercial service in early 2027 instead of next year, Bloomberg News reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
